title.rendered: Manufacturing Test Engineer I | Tulsa, OK

content.rendered:
Manufacturing Test Engineer I | Tulsa, Oklahoma
  • Full-time position
  • Must interact with other engineering groups and quality control to define, document, analyze, perform and interpret tests for products, systems, components, or modifications
  • Will identify functional issues encountered in production and suggests resolutions
  • Will design and Implement Maxim I and Maxim II automated testing for new and existing products
  • Must assist and provide technical support and troubleshooting for manufacturing operations with a heavy emphasis on electronics
  • Will also actively participate in the Corporate Quality Improvement Process
  • B.S. Electrical Engineering, B.S. Computer Engineering, or equivalent Bachelor’s Degree required
  • 3 years experience as a Test Engineer, Design Engineer, or Electronics Manufacturing Engineer a plus
  • Experience in the design or testing of analog and digital electronic circuits required
  • Experience using schematic capture and PCB layout software required
  • Must be familiar with USB, RS232, RS485 and CAN
  • $60,000-$65,000/year
